mapper.insert: insert into ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST (ID_, PROC_INST_ID_, EXECUTION_ID_, TASK_ID_, NAME_, REV_, VAR_TYPE_, SCOPE_ID_, SUB_SCOPE_ID_, SCOPE_TYPE_, BYTEARRAY_ID_, DOUBLE_, LONG_ , TEXT_, TEXT2_, CREATE_TIME_, LAST_UPDATED_TIME_) values ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processInstanceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{variableName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{revision, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{variableType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subScopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scopeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byteArrayRef, typeHandler=VariableByteArrayRefTypeHandler}, #{doubleValue, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{longValue, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{textValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textValue2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST (ID_, PROC_INST_ID_, EXECUTION_ID_, TASK_ID_, NAME_, REV_, VAR_TYPE_, SCOPE_ID_, SUB_SCOPE_ID_, SCOPE_TYPE_, BYTEARRAY_ID_, DOUBLE_, LONG_ , TEXT_, TEXT2_, CREATE_TIME_, LAST_UPDATED_TIME_) values
( #{historicVariable.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.processInstanceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.executionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.taskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.variableName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.revision, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.variableType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.scopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.subScopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.scopeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.byteArrayRef, typeHandler=VariableByteArrayRefTypeHandler}, #{historicVariable.doubleValue, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{historicVariable.longValue, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{historicVariable.textValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.textValue2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{historicVariable.lastUpdatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT ALL
INTO ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST (ID_, PROC_INST_ID_, EXECUTION_ID_, TASK_ID_, NAME_, REV_, VAR_TYPE_, SCOPE_ID_, SUB_SCOPE_ID_, SCOPE_TYPE_, BYTEARRAY_ID_, DOUBLE_, LONG_ , TEXT_, TEXT2_, CREATE_TIME_, LAST_UPDATED_TIME_) VALUES ( #{historicVariable.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.processInstanceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.executionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.taskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.variableName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.revision, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.variableType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.scopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.subScopeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.scopeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.byteArrayRef, typeHandler=VariableByteArrayRefTypeHandler}, #{historicVariable.doubleValue, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{historicVariable.longValue, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{historicVariable.textValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.textValue2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicVariable.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{historicVariable.lastUpdatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.update:
update ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST
REV_ = #{revisionNext, jdbcType=INTEGER},
NAME_ = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BYTEARRAY_ID_ = #{byteArrayRef, typeHandler=VariableByteArrayRefTypeHandler},
DOUBLE_ = #{doubleValue, jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LONG_ = #{longValue, jdbcType=BIGINT},
TEXT_ = #{textValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEXT2_ = #{textValue2, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VAR_TYPE_ = #{variableType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPDATED_TIME_ = #{lastUpdatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID_ = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and REV_ = #{revision, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST where ID_ = #{id} and REV_ = #{revision}

delete VARINST from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST VARINST where VARINST.PROC_INST_ID_ is not null and VARINST.PROC_INST_ID_ != '' and NOT EXISTS (select PROCINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_PROCINST PROCINST where VARINST.PROC_INST_ID_ = PROCINST.ID_)

delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST VARINST where VARINST.PROC_INST_ID_ is not null and NOT EXISTS (select PROCINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_PROCINST PROCINST where VARINST.PROC_INST_ID_ = PROCINST.ID_)
delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST where PROC_INST_ID_ is not null and PROC_INST_ID_ != '' and PROC_INST_ID_ NOT IN (select PROCINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_PROCINST PROCINST)
delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST where PROC_INST_ID_ is not null and PROC_INST_ID_ != '' and PROC_INST_ID_ NOT IN (select PROCINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_PROCINST PROCINST)

delete BYTES_ from ${prefix}ACT_GE_BYTEARRAY BYTES_ where BYTES_.ID_ in ( select VARINST.BYTEARRAY_ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST VARINST where VARINST.PROC_INST_ID_ is not null and VARINST.PROC_INST_ID_ != '' and not exists ( select PROCINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_PROCINST PROCINST where VARINST.PROC_INST_ID_ = PROCINST.ID_ ) and VARINST.BYTEARRAY_ID_ is not null )

delete VARINST from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST VARINST where VARINST.SCOPE_ID_ is not null and VARINST.SCOPE_ID_ != '' and VARINST.SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn' and NOT EXISTS (select CASEINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST CASEINST where VARINST.SCOPE_ID_ = CASEINST.ID_)

delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST VARINST where VARINST.SCOPE_ID_ is not null and VARINST.SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn' and NOT EXISTS (select CASEINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST CASEINST where VARINST.SCOPE_ID_ = CASEINST.ID_)
delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST where SCOPE_ID_ is not null and SCOPE_ID_ != '' and SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn' and SCOPE_ID_ NOT IN (select CASEINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST CASEINST)
delete from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST where SCOPE_ID_ is not null and SCOPE_ID_ != '' and SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn' and SCOPE_ID_ NOT IN (select CASEINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST CASEINST)

delete BYTES_ from ${prefix}ACT_GE_BYTEARRAY BYTES_ where BYTES_.ID_ in ( select VARINST.BYTEARRAY_ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST VARINST where VARINST.SCOPE_ID_ is not null and VARINST.SCOPE_ID_ != '' and VARINST.SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn' and not exists ( select CASEINST.ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST CASEINST where VARINST.SCOPE_ID_ = CASEINST.ID_ ) and VARINST.BYTEARRAY_ID_ is not null )
mapper.select: select * from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST where SCOPE_ID_ = #{parameter.scopeId} and SCOPE_TYPE_ = #{parameter.scopeType}
select * from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST where SUB_SCOPE_ID_ = #{parameter.subScopeId} and SCOPE_TYPE_ = #{parameter.scopeType}
